SELECT SEQ_T_EMP.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT into T_EMP(E_ID, E_UNAME, E_SEX, E_BIRTH, E_BP, E_EDU, E_MAJOR, E_EMAIL, E_PHONE, E_SCHOOL, E_CARDNO,E_ENAME,E_PASS,E_DID,E_PID,E_STATE,E_ENTRYTIME,E_INTRO) VALUES (#{id},#{uname},#{sex},#{birth},#{bp},#{edu},#{major},#{email},#{phone},#{school}, #{cardno},null,null,#{depa.id},#{position.id},#{state},sysdate,null)
mapper.update: UPDATE T_EMP SET E_PID=0,E_DID=0,E_STATE=2,E_INTRO=#{1} WHERE E_ID=#{0}
UPDATE T_EMP SET E_STATE=#{state} where E_ID=#{id}
UPDATE T_EMP SET E_PID=#{position.id} ,E_DID=#{depa.id} where E_ID=#{id}
UPDATE T_EMP SET E_ENAME=#{ename},E_PASS=#{pass} where E_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_EMP,T_DEPA,T_POSITION WHERE E_DID=#{did} and (E_STATE=0 OR E_STATE=1)

SELECT E_ID, E_UNAME, E_SEX, E_BIRTH, E_BP, E_EDU, E_MAJOR, E_EMAIL, E_PHONE, E_SCHOOL, E_CARDNO,E_ENAME,E_PASS,E_DID,E_PID,E_STATE,P_PNAME,D_DNAME from ( SELECT rownum rn,e.*,d.*,p.*from T_EMP e,T_DEPA d,T_POSITION p where E_DID=#{0} AND (E_STATE=0 OR E_STATE=1) and E_DID=D_ID AND E_PID=P_ID)a where rn between #{1} and #{2}
SELECT * FROM T_EMP,T_DEPA,T_POSITION WHERE E_PID=#{pid} and (E_STATE=0 OR E_STATE=1)

SELECT E_ID, E_UNAME, E_SEX, E_BIRTH, E_BP, E_EDU, E_MAJOR, E_EMAIL, E_PHONE, E_SCHOOL, E_CARDNO,E_ENAME,E_PASS,E_DID,E_PID,E_STATE,P_PNAME,D_DNAME from ( SELECT rownum rn,e.*,d.*,p.*from T_EMP e,T_DEPA d,T_POSITION p where E_PID=#{0} and (E_STATE=0 OR E_STATE=1) and E_DID=D_ID AND E_PID=P_ID)a where rn between #{1} and #{2}
SELECT * FROM T_EMP,T_POSITION,T_DEPA where E_DID=D_ID AND E_PID=P_ID
